title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.10 - Congregating at entrance prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.10 - Congregating at entrance prohibited

State Regulations

No persons shall be allowed to congregate inside or outside
the entrance, nor at any point contiguous to it, if the security and safety of
the institution are thereby threatened. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
51.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
